00048 template <class BPQNode>
00049 class GBPQueue
00050 {
00051   friend class GBPQueueCursor<BPQNode>;

00063   GBPQueue(int a, int b);
00064 
00068   ~GBPQueue() { if (_T != 0) delete [] _T; }

00076   void setUp(int a, int b);
00077 
00083   int getKey(const BPQNode& it) const { return it._key + _offset; }
00084 
00086   int getMax() const { return _max + _offset; }
00087 
00089   bool isEmpty() const { return _max == 0; }

00200 template <class BPQNode>
00201 inline GBPQueue<BPQNode>::GBPQueue(int a, int b) :
00202   _offset(a - 1),
00203   _high(b - _offset),
00204   _max(0),
00205   _T(new GDList<BPQNode>[_high+1])
00206 { 
00207   assert(b >= a);
00208   _T[0].makeDummy(); // sentinel
00209 
00210   /* The propose of_T[0] is to reduce the boundary check. _T[0] acts
00211      like a non-empty list so that _T[0].isEmpty() always returns
00212      false. Don't insert items to _T[0]. */
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 template <class BPQNode>
00217 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::setUp(int a, int b)
00218 { 
00219   assert(b >= a);
00220 
00221   _offset = a - 1;
00222   _high = b - _offset;
00223   _max = 0;
00224   _T = new GDList<BPQNode>[_high + 1];  
00225   _T[0].makeDummy(); // sentinel
00226 
00227   /* The propose of_T[0] is to reduce the boundary check. _T[0] acts
00228      like a non-empty list so that _T[0].isEmpty() always returns
00229      false. Don't insert items to _T[0]. */
00230 }

00233 template <class BPQNode>
00234 inline bool GBPQueue<BPQNode>::isValid() const
00235 {
00236   unsigned int cur = _max; 
00237   while (cur > 0) if (!_T[cur--].isValid()) return false;
00238   return true;
00239 } 
00240 
00241 template <class BPQNode>
00242 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::clear()
00243 { 
00244   while (_max > 0) _T[_max--].clear();
00245 } 
00246 
00247 template <class BPQNode>
00248 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::pushBack(BPQNode& it, int k) 
00249 { 
00250   const unsigned int key = k - _offset;
00251   assert(!(key<1 || key>_high));
00252   if (_max < key) _max = key;
00253   it._key = key;
00254   _T[key].pushBack(it); 
00255 }
00256 
00257 template <class BPQNode>
00258 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::pushBackFast(BPQNode& it, int k) 
00259 { 
00260   const unsigned int key = k - _offset;
00261   assert(!(key<1 || key>_high));
00262   it._key = key;
00263   _T[key].pushBack(it); 
00264 }

00275 template <class BPQNode>
00276 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::resync() 
00277 { 
00278   _max = _high; 
00279   while (_T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--; 
00280 }
00281 
00282 template <class BPQNode>
00283 inline BPQNode& GBPQueue<BPQNode>::popFront()
00284 { 
00285   assert(_max>0);
00286   BPQNode& res = _T[_max].popFront();
00287   while (_T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--; 
00288   return res;
00289 
00290   /* Without the sentinel, the above while loop needs to check the
00291      boundary condition, i.e., max > 0:
00292            while (_max > 0 && _T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--; 
00293      Other functions below may also need the similar check.
00294    */
00295 }
00296 
00297 template <class BPQNode>
00298 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::decreaseKeyLIFOBy(BPQNode& it, unsigned int m)
00299 { 
00300   assert(it._key > m);
00301   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00302   it._key -= m;
00303   _T[it._key].pushFront(it); 
00304   while (_T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--;
00305 }
00306 
00307 template <class BPQNode>
00308 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::increaseKeyLIFOBy(BPQNode& it, unsigned int m)
00309 { 
00310   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00311   unsigned int& key = it._key;
00312   key += m;
00313   assert(key<=_high);
00314   _T[key].pushFront(it); 
00315   if (key > _max) _max = key;
00316 }
00317 
00318 template <class BPQNode>
00319 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::promote(BPQNode& it)
00320 { 
00321   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00322   assert(it._key<=_high);
00323   _T[it._key].pushFront(it); 
00324 }
00325 
00326 template <class BPQNode>
00327 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::demote(BPQNode& it)
00328 { 
00329   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00330   assert(it._key<=_high);
00331   _T[it._key].pushBack(it); 
00332 }
00333 
00334 template <class BPQNode>
00335 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::decreaseKeyBy(BPQNode& it, unsigned int m)
00336 { 
00337   assert(it._key > m);
00338   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00339   unsigned int& key = it._key;
00340   key -= m;
00341   _T[key].pushBack(it); 
00342   while (_T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--;
00343 }
00344 
00345 template <class BPQNode>
00346 void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::increaseKeyBy(BPQNode& it, unsigned int m)
00347 { 
00348   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00349   unsigned int& key = it._key;
00350   key += m;
00351   assert(key<=_high);
00352   _T[key].pushBack(it); 
00353   if (key > _max) _max = key;
00354 }
00355 
00356 template <class BPQNode>
00357 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::modifyKeyLIFOBy(BPQNode& it, int m)
00358 { 
00359   // Experiments showed that "increase key" is more often than "decrease key"
00360   if (m > 0) increaseKeyLIFOBy(it, m);
00361   else if (m < 0) decreaseKeyLIFOBy(it, -m);
00362 }
00363 
00364 template <class BPQNode>
00365 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::modifyKeyBy(BPQNode& it, int m)
00366 { 
00367   // Experiments showed that "increase key" is more often than "decrease key"
00368   if (m > 0) increaseKeyBy(it, m);
00369   else if (m < 0) decreaseKeyBy(it, -m);
00370 }
00371 
00372 template <class BPQNode>
00373 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::detach(BPQNode& it) 
00374 { 
00375   GDList<BPQNode>::detach(it);
00376   while (_T[_max].isEmpty()) _max--; 
00377 }
00378 
00379 template <class BPQNode>
00380 inline void GBPQueue<BPQNode>::pushTo(GDList<BPQNode>& list) 
00381 {
00382   while (_max > 0) {
00383     if (!_T[_max].isEmpty()) {
00384       list.concat(_T[_max]);
00385     }
00386     --_max;
00387   }
00388   assert(isEmpty());
00389 }

00401 template <class BPQNode>
00402 class GBPQueueCursor
00403 {
00404 private:
00405   GBPQueue<BPQNode>*    _bpq;       
00406   GDList<BPQNode>*      _T;         
00407   unsigned int          _curKey;    
00408   GDListCursor<BPQNode> _lc;        
00411 private:
00413   unsigned int getKey() const 
00414   { 
00415     return _curKey + _bpq->_offset; 
00416   }
00417 
00418 public:
00420   GBPQueueCursor() {}
00421   
00423   GBPQueueCursor(GBPQueue<BPQNode>& BPQ) : 
00424     _bpq(&BPQ), 
00425     _T(BPQ._T), 
00426     _curKey(BPQ._max), 
00427     _lc(_T[_curKey]) 
00428   {
00429   } 
00430 
00432   void associate(GBPQueue<BPQNode>& BPQ) 
00433   { 
00434     _bpq = &BPQ; 
00435     _T = BPQ._T; 
00436     reset(); 
00437   }
00438 
00440   void reset() 
00441   { 
00442     _curKey = _bpq->_max; 
00443     _lc.associate(_T[_curKey]); 
00444   }
00445 
00447   bool hasNext() const 
00448   { 
00449     return _curKey > 0; 
00450   }
00451 
00454   unsigned int getRelKey() const 
00455   { 
00456     return _curKey; 
00457   }
00458 
00460   BPQNode& getNext()
00461   {
00462     assert(hasNext());
00463     BPQNode& res = _lc.getNext();
00464     while (!_lc.hasNext()) _lc.associate(_T[--_curKey]);
00465     return res;
00466   }
00467 };
